summary: MY 2014 NISSAN VERSA SHUT DOWN TODAY WHILE I WAS DRIVING! LUCKLY I WAS ON A PARKING STRUCTURE. I LOOKED UP MY VIN FOR ANY RECALLS AND IT SHOWS 0 HOWEVER, I DID LOCATE A RECALL THAT WAS MADE FOR 2014 NISSAN VERSAS SEDAN FOR THE EXACT SAME THING THAT HAPPENED TO MY CAR AND I'M WONDERING WHY MY VEHICLE IS NOT PART THE THE RECALL VIN NUMBERS.
